Articles.Content: The long narrow RCS thruster that has the most power didn't seem to work at all for me. I had some small monopropellant tanks on the side of my lander with some thrusters on all sides and none of them would fire, even when trying to use throttle as input.
Not a Bug - Read the description of that part more carefully.  It is in fact a methalox engine, that just happens to respond to RCS inputs instead of main throttle.
